snippet: Pedro de Verona Rodrigues Pires was praised for improving conditions in his country and for not seeking to extend his tenure beyond constitutional limits.
lead_paragraph: Pedro de Verona Rodrigues Pires was praised for improving conditions in his country and for not seeking to extend his tenure beyond constitutional limits.

headline.main: Ex-President of Cape Verde Wins Good-Government Prize
headline.print_headline: Ex-President of Cape Verde Wins Good-Government Prize
headline.seo: Cape Verde Ex-Leader, Pires, Wins Ibrahim Prize
